Uses of Interface
org.sbrubbles.conditio.Condition

  • Packages that use Condition 
    Package Description
    org.sbrubbles.conditio
    Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.

    • Uses of Condition in org.sbrubbles.conditio

      Classes in org.sbrubbles.conditio with type parameters of type Condition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Signal<C extends Condition>
      Holds data about a specific signal invocation, including the condition.
      Methods in org.sbrubbles.conditio with type parameters of type Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <C extends Condition>
      BiFunction<Signal<C>,Handler.Operations,Handler.Decision>      		 Handlers.abort()
      A handler body that aborts execution.
      static <C extends Condition>
      Predicate<Signal<C>>      		 Signals.conditionType(Class<C> type)
      Creates a predicate which checks if a signal holds a condition compatible with the given type.
      default <C extends Condition,SubC extends C>
      Scope      		 Scope.handle(Class<SubC> conditionType, BiFunction<Signal<C>,Handler.Operations,Handler.Decision> body)
      Establishes a new handler in this scope, which matches on any conditions compatible with the given type, and runs the given body to produce a result.
      static <C extends Condition,SubC extends C>
      Handler      		 Handlers.on(Predicate<Signal<SubC>> predicate, BiFunction<Signal<C>,Handler.Operations,Handler.Decision> body)
      Creates and returns a new handler, with a default implementation.
      static <C extends Condition>
      BiFunction<Signal<C>,Handler.Operations,Handler.Decision>      		 Handlers.restart(Restart.Option option)
      A handler body that invokes the restart matching the given option.
      static <C extends Condition>
      Predicate<Signal<C>>      		 Signals.returnType(Class<?> type)
      Creates a predicate which checks if a signal expects a result compatible with the given type.
      static <C extends Condition>
      BiFunction<Signal<C>,Handler.Operations,Handler.Decision>      		 Handlers.skip()
      A handler body that skips handling.
      Methods in org.sbrubbles.conditio with parameters of type Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void Scope.notify(Condition condition, Restart<?>... restarts)
      Signals a condition which may go unhandled and returns no useful value.
      default <T> T Scope.raise(Condition condition, Class<T> returnType, Restart<? extends T>... restarts)
      Signals a condition that must be handled and return a result.
      <T> T Scope.signal(Condition condition, Policies<T> policies, Restart<? extends T>... restarts)
      Signals a situation which the currently running code doesn't know how to deal with.
